Others: Bradley Beal scored 25 points as a reserve for the Phoenix Suns, helping them snap a four-game losing streak with a 109-99 victory over the Philadelphia 76ers.
Beal scored 20 points in the second half and the Suns' bench outscored Philadelphia's bench 54-7.
Jusuf Nurkic, who was returning from a three-game suspension, also came off the bench and scored five points with seven rebounds.
